CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Multiplex relative to Azure Vista Cinema?
SRP.A: Zenith Multiplex is {below} Azure Vista Cinema in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Multiplex relative to Meridian Picture House?
SRP.A: Zenith Multiplex is {below} Meridian Picture House in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Vista Cinema relative to Meridian Picture House?
SRP.A: Azure Vista Cinema is {above} Meridian Picture House in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Picture House}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Multiplex}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Vista Cinema's maximum Cinema Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Vista Cinema's maximum Cinema Attendance is in {2018}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Vista Cinema's minimum Cinema Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Vista Cinema's minimum Cinema Attendance is in {2002}.

NC.Q: Between 2020 and 2022, was the average total Cinema Attendance higher or lower than between 2003 and 2012?
NC.A: The average total cinema attendance between 2020 and 2022 was {lower} than between 2003 and 2012.

NC.Q: Was the total Cinema Attendance in 1998 higher or lower than in 2021?
NC.A: The total cinema attendance in 1998 was {higher} than in 2021.

NC.Q: Between 2015 and 2019, did the total Cinema Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 1997 and 2002?
NC.A: The change in total cinema attendance between 2015 and 2019 was {smaller} than between 1997 and 2002.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2012, did the total Cinema Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 1999 and 2013?
NC.A: The change in total cinema attendance between 2005 and 2012 was {smaller} than between 1999 and 2013.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Meridian Picture House} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Azure Vista Cinema and Meridian Picture House first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Azure Vista Cinema and Meridian Picture House first exchanged leading positions in {1998}.
